fields.effect: Spawns six troll bombs around the room.
Causes Isaac to have bad gas, poisoning any enemy in close vicinity.
Throws a bomb in the direction Isaac's facing. It does extreme damage, poisons the enemy for 5 seconds, and destroys rocks.

Upon activation, Isaac gains Flight, allowing him to pass over all obstacles in the current room. Instantly kills Mom, Mom's Heart and It Lives when activated, will kill Isaac when activated while fighting Satan, Isaac or ??? unless he has The Wafer.
Adds 2 points of damage for the current room. Damage is further multiplied by 1.5x with the Blood Of The Martyr item. Also increases chances of a Devil Room spawning by 25%.
Adds 1 Soul Heart and makes the next boss a Horseman (except on XL Floors and on floors with fixed bosses such as Mom). Increases chances of a Devil Room spawning by 35%.
Grants Isaac invulnerability for 10 seconds.
Spawns a random Pick Up, Pill or Card.
Uses a random Activated Item.
Gives Isaac a random Tarot Card.
Allows Isaac to re-roll collectible items in the current room into other items, depending on the current room's Item Pool.

Sets a big red target on the ground (similar to the Epic Fetus item) which can be controlled with the arrow keys or the mouse. After 6 seconds or by pressing space again, a huge explosive missile hits it, which damages all enemies caught in its blast radius.
When activated, the level ends and is freshly regenerated with new rooms, monsters, and items. Disappears after use.

Isaac turns into a Pac-Man-like creature for 5 seconds, gaining invincibility, +0.28 Speed, and the ability to damage enemies by touch, restoring a half-heart of health for every 2 enemies killed. Enemies will also turn blue and start fleeing from Isaac for the duration of the effect.
Upon activation, enemies and their projectiles are slowed down for 7.67 seconds.
Creates an explosion in the same area as Isaac, dealing one heart of damage to him and also damaging all enemies caught in the blast radius.
Creates a small yellow pool of Creep, which damages enemies that cross it.
Gives Isaac a random Pill, and will cause him to drop any held Q-slot item (If any). The player will only receive six different pill types in one playthrough.
Causes Isaac to wear a bra on his head for a short period of time, which freezes enemies for 5 seconds.
Causes enemies to back away from Isaac for 5 seconds.
Summons a random familiar for the current room only, even if it is locked.
Monstro jumps onto a random enemy, doing damage. Cannot be used in a fight against Monstro, but can be used against Monstro II.
Drops a large bomb.

Grants Isaac invincibility for a short period of time. Isaac cannot fire tears during the invincibility effect, but he can damage enemies by touch. Increases Speed by 0.28 for the duration of the effect.

On activation, adds one Soul Heart and allows the breaking of Rocks and damaging enemies by simply walking over them.
Increases Damage by 0.7 and decreases Speed by 0.18 for current room.
Damages all enemies in the room significantly.

Upon use, Isaac will charge in the direction selected, and will become invincible during the charge, allowing him to damage enemies by touch.
While equipped, passively increases Speed to a minimum of 1.5, and grants Isaac Flight.
Drops a pile of poop at his current location. This pile of poop may yield Hearts or Coins like regular poop.
Deals 1 Heart of damage to Isaac, which increases damage for the current room.
Separates Isaac's head and body for the current room. Isaac's head will be controlled, which now has Flight, while his body will seek out enemies to attack by contact damage.
Fires a laser from Isaac's mouth.

Shoots 10 tears in a circle around Isaac, which retain the size (damage), shot speed, and special effects (such as Poison) of Isaac's tears. The tears are not affected by tear-replacing items like Brimstone.
Teleports Isaac to a random room on the current floor.

Creates a trapdoor to go to the next floor. If used in The Womb, it will create a trapdoor to Sheol, even if the player hasn't unlocked it. 
Does not work in Sheol, The Cathedral, or The Chest.
Restores 1 whole heart.

Deploys a decoy Isaac that eventually explodes with an increased blast radius.
Like all explosive attacks, the explosion can hurt Isaac if he is within the blast radius.
Deals a half-heart of damage to Isaac, which damages all enemies in the room.

Throws out a blue flame that can pass over gaps (but not through rocks) that damages anything in its path.
Recharges 3 seconds after firing.
Summons multiple beams of light in random locations around the room, dealing a large amount of damage to any enemy that touches them.
Reveals the map and drops a random Tarot Card or Soul Heart.
Randomly changes all Pick Ups in the current room.
Opens all doors in the current room when activated, except rooms which require a Key to open, such as Treasure Rooms and Libraries.
Spawns 2-4 Blue Flies to damage enemies.
Removes one Heart Container in exchange for gaining 3 Soul Hearts.
Upon activation, Isaac loses a half-heart (one whole heart in The Womb and onwards) for a random amount of coins, similar to the Blood Donation Machine.
Breaks a single rock when activated.
Upon activation, 1 coin will be consumed, and a random Pick Up may drop, similar to the Slot Machine.
Grants half an Eternal Heart per use.

Bombs you place explode only when you use this item.
Gives 5 bombs.
Damages all enemies in the room and and slows them and their projectiles down for 2.5 seconds (similar to The Hourglass).
Gives Isaac homing tears for the current room. (Identical to Spoon Bender)

Upon use, Isaac will become invincible and charge in the direction selected, dealing damage to monsters touched. In addition, beams of light (similar to Crack The Sky) drop down in random locations around the room, damaging any enemies that touch them.
While equipped, increases Speed up to a minimum of 1.5, and grants Isaac Flight.
Increases available heart containers by 1 and restores all health.
Gives an extra life. Upon death, you will respawn in the previous room with full health and lose the 1UP.

Leaves Isaac with two bars already charged after using an item.
Upon pickup, Isaac's current activated item will be fully charged.
Gives Isaac an extra charge every 15 seconds per room, up to a maximum of 3 charges.
Increases Speed by 2.

Increases HP by 1, Speed by 0.3, and restores 4 hearts.
More than one can be obtained during a same playthrough
Increases Damage by 1, and turns Isaac's tears into blood tears. If collected with the The Book of Belial, damage will also be multiplied by 1.5x upon activation.
Gives Isaac 5 Bombs, and causes all dropped bombs to home towards the closest enemy.
Isaac is followed by a small bag that drops a Bomb, 1+1 Free, or a Troll Bomb every 3 rooms.
Gives 10 bombs.
Increases HP by 1.

Changes tears to a chargeable laser, which pierces all objects in its path. Also multiplies damage by 3.
It can only be fired after a short charge-up period.
Follows Isaac around shooting normal tears.
Gives two empty heart containers, heals by half a heart but decreases speed by 1.
Killing 13 monsters heals the player for half a heart.
Allows Isaac to charge shots, making them a lot stronger and larger, and turns them brown. Tears will no longer automatically fire while holding down arrow keys.
Gives Isaac's shot a chance of poisoning enemies for a 2.5 seconds, and turns tears green.
Reveals all special rooms (Boss Rooms, Treasure Rooms, Shops, etc.), but not Secret Rooms/Super Secret Rooms or regular rooms.

The first pick up gives a floating cube similar to a Pretty Fly that damages enemies and blocks shots.
The second pick up changes it into a floating head that shoots red tears and blocks shots.
The third pick up changes it into a humanoid Meat Boy, who walks around chasing enemies, but no longer shoot projectiles.
(This stage and the last stage can push bombs around, which can damage Isaac if the player is not careful)
The fourth pick up increases his size and damage.
A fifth pick up will create another cube of meat orbital which then advances to another Super Meat Boy. However, it is not possible to have three or more Meat Boys, as the ninth cube will simply disappear on pickup.
Gives Isaac piercing tears that can travel through enemies. Removes knockback effect of tears.
Whenever Isaac takes damage, the bird starts attacking nearby enemies while flying over obstacles. The effect only lasts for the current room.

Your HP is set to 1.
You are followed by a floating cat head and have 9 lives (these still count as deaths on the statistics screen).
You can increase your max HP as normal, but after each death it will reset to 1 again.
Increases available heart containers by 1.
Increases available heart containers by 1.

A red attack fly circles further out than the Halo of Flies/Pretty Flies, but closer than Forever Alone.
Deals more damage than Forever Alone.
Follows Isaac and automatically fires at enemies in its reach.

Gives Isaac 99 coins. 
Can be found multiple times in a single playthrough.

Replaces Isaac's shot with a bomb.
Only one bomb can be shot at a time, and it will slide a fixed range before exploding.
Spawns a blue attack fly that orbits a long distance from Isaac.
Increase Speed and Damage by 2 each.

Spawns a Guardian Angel that orbits Isaac.
Does damage on touch, blocks shots and doubles the speed of other orbitals.
Increases all stats (Including Heart Containers) by one.

Grants 2 Fly orbitals that circle Isaac.
Blocks shots and damages Fly enemies on touch.
Gives Isaac a triple shot, sets Tears to minimum
Allows Isaac to walk across gaps one square across by automatically placing a ladder between the two walkables.
Isaac is followed by Little C.H.A.D, who will drop a half Heart every 2 rooms.

Adds a small grub that follows Isaac.
Charges forward and deals touch damage to any enemies in her path. Will attack when the Isaac attacks with a moderate cooldown time before she can attack again.
Follows Isaac around shooting tar projectiles that reduce enemies' movement speed, shot speed, and range for a few seconds.
Follows Isaac around, shooting homing projectiles.
Gives a random chance for projectiles to fire in a cross (+) pattern.
Isaac can fly over all obstacles, including damage floors, spikes, rocks, and pits. Increases speed by 1.

All Pills picked up will have positive or neutral effects (same effect as the PHD, but without pill identification and neutral pills). Increases the chance of getting Pick Ups from clearing a room or from Poop and Fireplaces. Increases the chance of winning the Shell game in the Arcade room from 33% to roughly 50%. Increases the chances of getting items from Golden Chests.
Increases available heart containers by 1.
Increases damage of tears based on amount of time in the air. 0.14 damage per frame, or 4.2 damage per second.(tear size increases as it gets further away).
Fully heals Isaac, increases all Stats (excluding Rate Of Fire) by 1, and multiplies damage by 1.5x.
Pulls Pick Ups towards Isaac.
Increases Damage by 1, Speed by 0.2, and adds one Soul Heart.
Increases damage by 1, and multiplies it by 1.5x.
Increases Speed and Range by 1.
Gives Isaac a petrifying shot that will randomly freeze enemies solid for a few seconds.
Allows Isaac to fire tears from the back of his head.
Increases Range by 7.75.

Once collected, Isaac no longer shoots tears, he shoots a knife in boomerang style. The range of throw increases by charging the shot.
Can also be used as a melee weapon while not fired.
Increases Range by 7.75.
Increases Range by 7.75.
Increases damage based on the number of coins the player has at the moment.
Gives Isaac 5 bombs, and makes all dropped bombs larger (Similar to the bomb dropped by Mr. Boom), which have an increased blast radius and increased damage.
Gives Isaac's tears a boomerang effect, and sets range to default.
Sets Isaac's tears to their maximum rate of fire and minimum range.
Increases damage by 0.3, adds an empty Heart Container, increases range by 2.75 and reduces Speed by 0.1.
Increases Speed by 1, sets Rate Of Fire to maximum while reducing Damage by 1.
Turns Isaac's tears spectral, allowing them to go through rocks or obstacles.
Increases Damage by 0.5 and Rate Of Fire by 0.7. The player also gains 2 Soul Hearts.
Makes the Isaac's tears split in two when they hit something.
Increases Damage by 1 and increases chances of the Devil Room appearing by 20%..
Changes negative Pill effects into positive ones. Also causes Blood Donation Machines to drop more money. Restores 2 hearts upon pickup.
Gives you 25 pennies.
Increases available Heart Containers by 2 and completely restores health.
Isaac is followed by a small blue cross that will drop a Soul Heart every 5 rooms.
Follows Isaac around, shooting enemies with an eye laser similar to Technology.
Increases Speed by 0.6. Does NOT increase range.
Adds 3 Soul Hearts and increases the chance for The Bible to appear in the Shop.
Increases available heart containers by 1.

Isaac is followed by a small bag that drops a coin every 2 rooms.
Usually a penny, sometimes a nickel.
Increases tears by 0.7.
Follows Isaac around shooting blood tears.
All the various fly type enemies no longer harm you, shoot, or split.
Sets your key count to the maximum of 99.
Increases damage by 1, increases tears by 0.2, decreases speed by 0.2.
Reveals the Secret Room and Top Secret Room when passing by it and reveals if a room contains a mini-boss.
Gives Isaac's shots a chance of slowing enemies for 2.5 seconds.
Gives Isaac's shots the ability to curve towards enemies.
Reduces all Shop prices by 50%, rounded down when an item, rounded up when a pickup.
Increases Damage by 1.
Increases HP by 1 and gives 2 soul hearts.

Gives Isaac a laser shot with unlimited range.
Shots pierce enemies but not rocks, fire, or poop.
Shots can't be angled, and will not provide knockback.
Removes Isaac's body, allowing flight over obstacles, spikes and pits.
Reveals all rooms for every floor, including the Secret Room. However, it does not reveal icons.
Isaac will automatically poison any enemy that he touches.
Turns all types of damage into a half-heart, including damage taken in The Womb and onwards.
When Isaac reaches a half-heart, he is given +2.16 damage, and his speed increases by 0.3.
Gives Isaac waving shots and increases Rate Of Fire by 0.4.
Increases Tears by 0.7.
Increases speed by 0.3.
Reveals and opens Secret Room entrances.
Effect given changes every room.
Mirrors Isaac's movements. Shoots in opposite direction to the player.

When killed, respawns in the previous room as ???, regardless of the fact he is unlocked or not.

After respawn, all future HP upgrades will be soul hearts only. Only works once.
When taking damage, Isaac farts, causing poison damage to all enemies in range.
Increases damage each time Isaac kills an enemy for the current room. (.28 damage per kill, caps at 3.3.)
Gives 5 bombs and grants all bombs poison effect.
Spawns 1 of each item: 1 coin, 1 key, 1 bomb, 1 heart, 1 card, 1 pill, 1 trinket.
A portable Beggar who follows Isaac, pick up coins for himself, and occasionally drop Pick Ups. Does not spawn Collectibles. Can push around dropped bombs, similar to Meat Boy.
Increases Shot Speed by 23%.
Has a 20% to create a protective shield around Isaac upon taking damage, which grants him invulnerability to all forms of damage for 7 seconds.
Tears fired from left eye do increased damage.
Daddy Long Legs' shadow follows Isaac and stomps on enemies.
Gives Isaac spectral tears and flight.
Tears become guided missiles (See Doctor's Remote).
Isaac gains flight and an Eternal Heart.
Familiar that shoots spectral tears.

Loosely follows behind Isaac. Can be swung like a flail by rapidly spinning Isaac in a circle.
Grows bigger by killing enemies
Increases chance of gold chests and normal chests.
When Isaac is hit, 3 points of an item's charge are filled.
Familiar that shoots a pair of tears diagonally every second while Isaac is firing.
Adds 1 empty heart container and gives flying ability.

When Isaac receives damage, the bottle breaks and a puddle of blue Creep forms, which damages non-flying enemies, similar to Lemon Mishap.
The bottle is reformed upon entering a different room.
1-3 Blue Flies randomly spawn every time Isaac gets hit.
Green projectiles fired from the mouth causing poison/explosive damage.
Increases Damage by 0.5 and increases Range.

Increases Shot Speed.
Drops a Tarot Card when picked up.
Adds a heart container, and increases damage.
Greatly increases the chance of replacing spawned hearts with soul hearts.
Spawns 4 random Pills around Isaac.
Allows Isaac to hold 1 additional trinket.
Chance to spawn Blue Flies on successful hits, which charge current target.
Shoot four tears at once, greatly reduces tear firing rate.
Spawns several coins around Isaac.

Gives Isaac a familiar eye that floats around the room, damaging enemies on contact
Tears fired from left eye become red (cosmetic only)

Makes Isaac shoot one huge tear. Also reduces Tears to minimum. Damage increased by 4 and then multiplied by 2. 
If tear does more damage than an enemy's life, the tear continues to travel with the extra remaining damage.
Adds 99 Bombs.
Tear Effect changes every shot.

Shots are larger, travel slower and home in on enemies. Damage is multiplied. (Multiplies damage by X2.3+1, -0.4 tears, -0.25 shot speed.)
Gives 1 Soul Heart and restores full Health on Pick up.
Dagger orbits Isaac, very high damage.
Once per room, when Isaac is reduced to his last half red Heart, the aura around his head temporarily vanishes and he is granted one Soul Heart.
Increases all stats except Speed by 1. Reduces Speed by 1.
Increases movement speed and causes tears to travel faster.
Grants Isaac flight and spectral tears.
+1 tears and spawns 2 soul hearts.
Adds an extra Heart Container, heals a half heart, and increases Shot Speed.
Boosts Isaac's damage by 0.3 and grants you one heart container.

Fires a continuous laser as you shoot tears. Decreases your damage by -35%.
Pierces enemies.
Increases shot speed.
Isaac randomly shoots teeth instead of tears, dealing 3.2 times his normal damage.
